thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Physicians Realty Trust Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.27

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Physicians Realty Trust Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.27
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Physicians Realty Trust:
* REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 32.1 PERCENT TO $97.3 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.27 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.05 * QTRLY SAME-STORE CASH NET OPERATING INCOME GROWTH WAS 3.0% YEAR OVER YEAR
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.08, REVENUE VIEW $97.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.27 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
